notes: Flat pricing across all member types

network_hospitals: Private hospitals in the Dynamic Smart hospital network
exclusions: Skin disorders including benign growths and lipomas
Elective caesarean section (except if medically necessary)
Back and neck treatment or surgery
Cochlear implants and auditory brain implants
notes: Upfront payment of R5,500 applies to all hospital admissions.
Oncology benefit covered at network provider, limited to Prescribed Minimum Benefits.

procedures.notes: Day Surgery Network required. Out-of-network upfront payment of R15,300.
procedures.marketing_description: On Active Smart, Gastroscopy must be performed in the Dynamic Smart Day Surgery Network. If you go out-of-network, you pay an upfront amount of R15,300. PMB conditions may qualify for full cover at a designated provider.

jargon_busters.definition: A network of approved facilities where day procedures like scopes are performed at reduced or no cost.
An amount you must pay before or at admission if using an out-of-network facility.

faqs.question: What if I use the Day Surgery Network?
faqs.answer: You avoid the R15,300 out-of-network fee. Always use the Dynamic Smart Day Surgery Network for scopes.

faqs.question: Is pre-authorization required?
faqs.answer: Yes, you must obtain pre-authorization before any scope procedure.

preparation: Fast for at least 6 hours before the procedure (no food or water).
Arrange for someone to drive you home as you will be sedated.
Inform your doctor about any chronic medication you are taking.
procedures.recovery_time: You can usually go home 1-2 hours after the procedure. Mild bloating or throat irritation may persist for 24 hours.

procedures.notes: Day Surgery Network required. Out-of-network upfront payment of R15,300.
procedures.marketing_description: Colonoscopies on Active Smart must be in the Dynamic Smart Day Surgery Network. Out-of-network procedures attract a R15,300 upfront payment.
preparation: Drink the purgative solution as prescribed to clear the bowel.
Stay hydrated but stop all fluids 2 hours before admission.
procedures.recovery_time: You will be groggy from sedation. Do not drive for 24 hours. Eat light meals initially.

modules.title: Personal Health Fund
modules.description: Day-to-day healthcare benefit with accumulation based on Personal Health Pathway engagement.

data.notes: Complete Personal Health Pathway challenges to double your PHF limit.

modules.title: Oncology Care Programme
modules.description: Cancer treatment cover limited to Prescribed Minimum Benefits at network providers.

data.pmb_cover: Full cover for PMB cancer treatment at network providers
data.advanced_illness_benefit: Unlimited cover for approved end-of-life care
